query.prompt:
This text is written in Esperanto. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 En la mezo de la vojo de nia vivo 9 mi diros pri la aliaj aferoj, kiujn mi tie rimarkis. 28 Post kiam iom ripozis la laca korpo,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---| |En|en|preposition|||| |la|la|definite article|||| |mezo|mezo|noun|||| |de|de|preposition|||| |la|la|definite article|||| |vojo|vojo|noun|||| |de|de|preposition|||| |nia|nia|possessive adjective|||| |vivo|vivo|noun|||| |mi|mi|personal pronoun|||| |diros|diri|verb|future|indicative|| |pri|pri|preposition|||| |la|la|definite article|||| |aliaj|alia|adjective|||| |aferoj|afero|noun|||| |kiujn|kiu|relative pronoun|||| |mi|mi|personal pronoun|||| |tie|tie|adverb|||| |rimarkis|rimarki|verb|past|indicative|| |Post|post|preposition|||| |kiam|kiam|conjunction|||| |iom|iom|adverb|||| |ripozis|ripozi|verb|past|indicative|| |la|la|definite article|||| |laca|laca|adjective|||| |korpo|korpo|noun||||
